parameters.label: Computational settings
parameters.description: Adjusts main settings for the computation

integer.name: iDimension
integer.label: Image Dimension
integer.description: Specifies explicitly the dimension of the used images. If not specified, the image dimension is guessed. However, this can lead to ambiguities for vector-valued images.

string-enumeration.name: sFloatingPointType
string-enumeration.label: Floating point type
string-enumeration.description: Specifies the floating point type for the computations (float/double). In general float is recommended (because it will save memory). If CALATK is not compiled to support floating point choice, this option is ignored.

string-enumeration.name: sLDDMMSolverType
string-enumeration.label: LDDMM Solver Type
string-enumeration.description: Selects the desired LDDMM solver (simplifiedShooting/simplifiedShootingInitialImage/adjointShooting/adjointShootingInitialImage/relaxation). The relaxation solver performs the optimization over the full spatio-temporal velocity field. This is the algorithm by Beg. The simplified shooting method and the adjoint shooting method perform the optimization over the initial image and the initial momentum. The implementations are based on a modification of the shooting algorithm by Ashburner (simplified shooting) and the adjoint shooting method/geodesic regression formulation by Vialard/Niethammer.

image.name: sourceToTargetMap
image.label: Source to target map
image.description: Resulting registration map from source to target in target space.

image.name: warpedSourceImage
image.label: Warped source image
image.description: Name of the warped source image.

image.name: initialMomentumImage
image.label: Initial momentum image
image.description: Name of the initial momentum image.

image.name: internalInitialImage
image.label: Initial image
image.description: Name of the initial image. This is the actual initial image used (including internal processing).

image.name: internalTargetImage
image.label: Target image
image.description: Name of the target image. This is the actual target image used (including internal processing).

file.name: configFileOut
file.label: Resulting configuration file
file.description: JSON Configuration file which describes the full parameterization of the algorithm run..

boolean.name: bCleanJSONConfigOutput
boolean.description: If set a config file written out with --configOut will only contain values that are actually used within a run. This is useful when using a pre-specified configuration file with --config to extract only the relevant settings. Otherwise missing settings are simply added (which can also be useful if one would like to store multiple settings, e.g., for different kernels. etc. in one configuration file).

boolean.name: bCreateJSONHelp
boolean.description: If set, will generate annotated settings in the JSON configuration file. This is to help understand the meaning and options of the different settings.

integer-enumeration.name: logLevel
integer-enumeration.description: Sets the verbosity level for the algorithms that support multiple levels of output. Always (0), normal (1), verbose (2), very_verbose(3), most_verbose (4).
